ssot__ContactPointSocial__dlm.name: Contact Point Social
ssot__ContactPointSocial__dlm.description: The Contact Point Social DMO represents the social media handle for a party, such as @trustednews on Twitter.

ssot__ActiveFromDate__c.description: The date the social account is active.

ssot__ActiveToDate__c.description: The date the social account is inactive.

ssot__BestTimeToContactEndTime__c.description: A contact’s preferred date and time to stop receiving communications.

ssot__BestTimeToContactStartTime__c.description: A contact’s preferred date and time to start receiving communication.

ssot__BestTimeToContactTimezoneId__c.description: A reference ID to the contact’s preferred time zone.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Contact Point Social DMO.

ssot__ContactPointTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of contact.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date when the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__FollowersCount__c.description: The total number of followers that social media persona possesses.

ssot__ForBusinessUse__c.description: An indicator if the social account is used for business use.

ssot__ForPersonalUse__c.description: An indicator if the social account is used for personal use.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsActive__c.description: An indicator if the account is active.

ssot__IsUndeliverable__c.description: An indicator if the account is undeliverable.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__PartyId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent party, for example, an individual, business, or affiliation group. This ID is the same as the one used in the individual object.

ssot__PartyRoleId__c.description: A reference ID to the associated party role, for example, a customer, supplier, or competitor.

ssot__PrimaryFlag__c.description: An indicator if phone number is primary phone number of the individual or account.

ssot__ProfileFirstCreatedDate__c.description: The date the social profile was created.

ssot__ProfileLastUpdatedDate__c.description: The date the social profile was last updated.

ssot__ProfilePictureURL__c.description: The URL link to profile photo of social media account.

ssot__SocialFanStatusId__c.description: A reference ID to status of social media persona, for example and influencer or fan.

ssot__SocialHandleId__c.description: A reference ID to a social media handle.

ssot__SocialHandleName__c.description: The name of the social media persona.

ssot__SocialNetworkProviderId__c.description: A reference ID to source of social media persona, for example Facebook or LinkedIn.

ssot__TimezoneCode__c.description: A single-character code indicating the time zone's relationship to Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).
